mapper.select: SELECT top 10* FROM cnc_model WHERE cncsn = #{cncsn} AND alarmnum != 0

select top 10 convert(varchar(10),create_time,120) as alarminfo, count(Id) as count from cnc_model WHERE cncsn = #{cncsn} group by convert(varchar(10),create_time,120) ORDER BY convert(varchar(10),create_time,120) DESC
